explains: n. 谷类食物；谷类植物，谷物
adj. 谷类的；谷类制成的
wordGroup: cereal crop 禾谷类作物，粮食作物

sentences.en: He ate a large bowlful of cereal.
sentences.cn: 他吃了一大碗谷类早餐。

sentences.en: I have a bowl of cereal every morning.
sentences.cn: 我每天早上吃一碗麦片粥。

sentences.en: I munched my way through a huge bowl of cereal.
sentences.cn: 我狼吞虎咽地喝了一大碗麦片粥。
